name: explorer-frontend
description: Bitcoin Cash Explorer mempool visualizer and blockchain explorer frontend
license: GNU Affero General Public License v3.0

scripts.serve: npm run generate-config && npm run ng -- serve -c local
scripts.serve:local-prod: npm run generate-config && npm run ng -- serve -c local-prod
scripts.serve:parameterized: npm run generate-config && npm run ng -- serve -c parameterized
scripts.start: npm run generate-config && npm run sync-assets-dev && npm run ng -- serve -c local
scripts.start:parameterized: npm run generate-config && npm run sync-assets-dev && npm run ng -- serve -c parameterized
scripts.start:local-prod: npm run generate-config && npm run sync-assets-dev && npm run ng -- serve -c local-prod
scripts.start:mixed: npm run generate-config && npm run sync-assets-dev && npm run ng -- serve -c mixed
scripts.build: npm run generate-config && npm run ng -- build --configuration production --localize && npm run sync-assets-dev && npm run sync-assets
scripts.e2e: npm run generate-config && npm run ng -- e2e
scripts.dev:ssr: npm run generate-config && ng run mempool:serve-ssr
scripts.build:ssr: npm run build && ng run mempool:server:production && ./node_modules/typescript/bin/tsc server.run.ts
scripts.config:defaults:explorer: node update-config.js TESTNET_ENABLED=false TESTNET4_ENABLED=false SIGNET_ENABLED=false ITEMS_PER_PAGE=25 BASE_MODULE=mempool MIN_BLOCK_SIZE_UNITS=4000000 && npm run generate-config
scripts.config:defaults:mempool: node update-config.js TESTNET_ENABLED=true TESTNET4_ENABLED=true SIGNET_ENABLED=true ITEMS_PER_PAGE=25 BASE_MODULE=mempool MIN_BLOCK_SIZE_UNITS=4000000 && npm run generate-config
scripts.cypress:open:ci: node update-config.js TESTNET_ENABLED=true TESTNET4_ENABLED=true SIGNET_ENABLED=true ITEMS_PER_PAGE=25 && npm run generate-config && start-server-and-test serve:local-prod 4200 cypress:open
scripts.cypress:run:ci: node update-config.js TESTNET_ENABLED=true TESTNET4_ENABLED=true SIGNET_ENABLED=true ITEMS_PER_PAGE=25 && npm run generate-config && start-server-and-test serve:local-prod 4200 cypress:run:record
scripts.cypress:open:ci:parameterized: node update-config.js TESTNET_ENABLED=true TESTNET4_ENABLED=true SIGNET_ENABLED=true ITEMS_PER_PAGE=25 && npm run generate-config && start-server-and-test serve:parameterized 4200 cypress:open
scripts.cypress:run:ci:parameterized: node update-config.js TESTNET_ENABLED=true TESTNET4_ENABLED=true SIGNET_ENABLED=true ITEMS_PER_PAGE=25 && npm run generate-config && start-server-and-test serve:parameterized 4200 cypress:run:record
